source_organisation_1: 2009 Population and Housing Census, VNSO (published figure in 2014 Socio-Economic Atlas p 52)

graph_title: Proportion of households engaged in production of food for own consumption
goal_name: A nation that ensures our food and nutrition security needs are adequately met for all people through increasing sustainable food production systems and improving household production

indicator_name: Proportion of households engaged in production of food for own consumption
